Producer: Patrick Hibler, Joy Sirott Hurwitz, Phil Kim, David E. Ornston, Richard Salvatore, Julie Lott
Production Co: Lucky 13 Productions, Don Kee Productions, March On Productions, Scoring Berlin, Alla Prima Productions, Rapid Farms Productions, StoryBoard Media, Ingenious Media, Sprockefeller Pictures, Living the Dream Films
Synopsis: Indebted to the mob, two movie producers try to save themselves by setting up an aging actor for an insurance scam.
Title: The Comeback Trail
